groups.name: respack.filter.settings
groups.description: 返回值包装过滤器设置

properties.name: respack.filter.settings.enable
properties.description: 是否启用返回值包装过滤器

properties.name: respack.filter.settings.ignore-paths
properties.description: 不需要包装的url路径，用';'分隔

properties.name: respack.filter.settings.filter-order
properties.description: 过滤器在过滤链中的次序,默认值为低顺序，值越小，约靠前

properties.name: respack.filter.settings.max-cache
properties.description: 设置结果集的阈值，超过这个阈值就不会包装返回结果；unit:kb
